qas.question: According to Thomas Jefferson, when the media is free and people are literate they are what?

context: Thomas Jefferson observed a tendency for "The functionaries of every government ... to command at will the liberty and property of their constituents. There is no <a0_0>safe<a0_0/> deposit [for liberty and property] ... without information. Where the press is free, and every man able to read, all is safe."
